title: Bug 269522 [handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Cross reference view and markers incorrectly display joinpoints assigned to advice.
OB: When selecting line 22, there are 5 joinpoints visible (expected: 3). On selecting line 68, there are no visible joinpoints (expected: 2). Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' displays all 5 joinpoints.
EB: When selecting line 22, only 3 joinpoints should be visible. Selecting line 68 should display 2 joinpoints. After choosing 'advises' for the marker at line 68, only 2 joinpoints should appear.
SR:
1. Open the file containing the code. 
2. Go to line 22 and observe the displayed joinpoints. 
3. Proceed to line 68 and note the displayed joinpoints. 
4. Right-click the marker at line 68 and select 'advises' to observe the displayed joinpoints.
